name: Only in Whisper
description:
Only in Whisper is an psychological horror action game that is heavily inspired by classic horror game such as Resident Evil and Silent Hill.

Story:

You have wake up in a plane crash clueless if everything around you is real.
Walking in this endless labyrinth fight off different types of horrible creatures.
Walking in this endless labyrinth with no goal or hope in getting out.

Social Media:
Youtube : https://www.youtube.com/c/PolylabStudio
Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/PolylabIndieGame

Dev Notes:

Enemies and sound is not final but it will give you the idea on how the game will feels like
